001package squidpony.examples;
002
003import squidpony.squidgrid.mapping.styled.DungeonBoneGen;
004import squidpony.squidgrid.mapping.styled.TilesetType;
005import squidpony.squidgrid.mapping.DungeonUtility;
006import squidpony.squidmath.LightRNG;
007import squidpony.squidmath.RNG;
008
009/**
010 * Created by Tommy Ettinger on 4/2/2015.
011 */
012public class StyledDungeonTest {
013
014    public static void main( String[] args )
015    {
016        DungeonBoneGen bg = new DungeonBoneGen(new RNG(new LightRNG(0x1337deadbeef48aaL)));
017        for(TilesetType tt : TilesetType.values())
018        {
019            System.out.println(tt.toString());
020            bg.generate(tt, 80, 40);
021            bg.wallWrap();
022            System.out.println(bg);
023            bg.setDungeon(DungeonUtility.hashesToLines(bg.getDungeon()));
024            System.out.println(bg);
025            bg.setDungeon(DungeonUtility.doubleWidth(bg.getDungeon()));
026            System.out.println(bg);
027
028            System.out.println();
029        }
030    }
031}
